name: Falling rocks (Spaikeur)
description:
Game made during  programming courses. Programming course at the game design school "ETPA".

The game is about an astronaut in his spaceship which has crashed in the middle of nowhere. 

You are this astronaut, and you have to escape your ship which is about to explode.

The thing is, you have more or less a minute to escape before you ran out of oxygene.  (Watch out the electricity, it disturb your oxygen).

Desclaimer : 
The game is in french I'm sorry about that. I hadn't planned to expose it in broad daylight when i developed it
Once you've open and gone through the exit door, the game is finished. You have to "Alt + F4". I didn't program an end script.

Keys :
Moving : ZQSD 
Interact / Take : E
Light : F 

Playing time : 15min-30min.

Thank you a lot for ginving it a try ! Hope you had great escape ! 

Spoiler / Help :
If you struggle, i explain the process of the game furthmore : 

Your first goal, find your astronaut's gear, then reactivate the generators to open the door to escape.
Some of the generators need a computer, you can find them at some points of the ship. You can see your progress on the computer on the deck of the ship.
Once you had activated all the generators, you can open the door on the terminal of the docks.
